name: LekkerLisa

”Alexa, open Lekker Lisa”

”Alexa, ask Lekker Lisa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lekker lisa
des: In this educational exercise, this skill is designed to help you along when preparing a meal: from its database, you can choose a recipe to your liking and have Lekker Lisa guide you through the execution of it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
